stripped_text: trash: Prevent up to X net or brain damage. Trash cards from the top of your stack equal to the amount of damage prevented. X is the number of copies of Ramujan-reliant 550 BMI installed (including the one just trashed). Limit 6 per deck.
text:
[trash]: Prevent up to X net or brain damage. Trash cards from the top of your stack equal to the amount of damage prevented. X is the number of copies of Ramujan-reliant 550 BMI installed (including the one just trashed).
Limit 6 per deck.
title: Ramujan-reliant 550 BMI
